channel.title: UA feats have pages, but arent linked to on the frontpage
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "UA feats have pages, but arent linked to on the frontpage" - The new UA feats that were released this month have pages made for them, but arent accessible on the front page of the site

item.title: UA feats have pages, but arent linked to on the frontpage
item.content:encoded: Artificer initiate, Chef, Crusher, Eldritch Adept, Fey Touched, Fighting Initiate, Gunner, Metamagic Adept, Piercer, Poisoner, Practiced Expert, Shadow Touched, Shield training, Slasher, Tandem Tactician and tracker all have pages, and if a user has the link they can open them, however, they currently are not accessible from the links on the front page of the site in the 'Feats' Section
